title: Ukraine war: Russia railway station strike kills 22, injures dozens
content: A deadly attack on passenger carriages and a warning of disaster mark six months since Russia's invasion.
contentSnippet: A deadly attack on passenger carriages and a warning of disaster mark six months since Russia's invasion.

title: Uvalde school shooting: Embattled police chief is put on leave
content: Pete Arredondo has been much criticised for officers' 77-minute delay in confronting the teen gunman.
contentSnippet: Pete Arredondo has been much criticised for officers' 77-minute delay in confronting the teen gunman.

title: Kobe Bryant's widow awarded $16m leaked crash photos payout
content: Vanessa Bryant was suing LA County for emotional distress over photos from the 2020 crash site.
contentSnippet: Vanessa Bryant was suing LA County for emotional distress over photos from the 2020 crash site.

title: Student loan forgiveness: Biden cancels $10,000 in student debt for millions
content: Lower income students who had Pell Grants will get more debt cancelled - up to $20,000.
contentSnippet: Lower income students who had Pell Grants will get more debt cancelled - up to $20,000.

title: British-Belgian pilot, 17, becomes youngest to fly around the world solo
content: British-Belgian teen flew through sandstorms and spent the night on an uninhabited island to break record.
contentSnippet: British-Belgian teen flew through sandstorms and spent the night on an uninhabited island to break record.

title: France's Emmanuel Macron to mend Algeria ties as energy crisis bites
content: The French president's visit brings to an end a spat over memories of Algeria's war of independence.
contentSnippet: The French president's visit brings to an end a spat over memories of Algeria's war of independence.

title: Band stuck in Calais queue perform surprise gig
content: Drivers were treated to a makeshift jazzy concert as they waited in lengthy queues at the French border.
contentSnippet: Drivers were treated to a makeshift jazzy concert as they waited in lengthy queues at the French border.

title: Germany approves energy-saving measures for winter
content: The measures include turning down heating in public buildings as Germany tries to wean itself of Russian gas.
contentSnippet: The measures include turning down heating in public buildings as Germany tries to wean itself of Russian gas.

title: Peru to sue Repsol for $4.5bn over oil spill
content: The spill has been described by Peru as the worst ecological disaster around Lima in recent memory.
contentSnippet: The spill has been described by Peru as the worst ecological disaster around Lima in recent memory.

title: Ter Apel: Dutch investigate baby death at asylum centre
content: Officials are investigating possible contributing factors, including available care and living conditions.
contentSnippet: Officials are investigating possible contributing factors, including available care and living conditions.

title: Hamilton: US church apologies for modified rendition of hit musical
content: A Texas church announces it will pay damages for an unauthorised, Bible-themed Hamilton rewrite.
contentSnippet: A Texas church announces it will pay damages for an unauthorised, Bible-themed Hamilton rewrite.

title: Ethiopia's Tigray war: Fresh fighting shatters humanitarian truce
content: Ethiopian and Tigrayan forces trade blame for breaking a truce which enabled vital aid deliveries.
contentSnippet: Ethiopian and Tigrayan forces trade blame for breaking a truce which enabled vital aid deliveries.

title: South Africans in nationwide strike in protest against cost of living
content: Thousands take part in a nationwide strike against the high cost of living, demanding government action.
contentSnippet: Thousands take part in a nationwide strike against the high cost of living, demanding government action.

title: Is Biden's student debt forgiveness fair?
content: While tens of millions will benefit from loan relief, the plan has critics on both sides of the aisle.
contentSnippet: While tens of millions will benefit from loan relief, the plan has critics on both sides of the aisle.

title: Why India made a U-turn on free trade deals
content: After years of reluctance, Delhi is signing several free trade deals. But will it help local businesses?
contentSnippet: After years of reluctance, Delhi is signing several free trade deals. But will it help local businesses?

title: Rohingya crisis: Has the world forgotten the stateless refugees?
content: Five years after millions of Rohingyas fled genocide in Myanmar, they continue to live in perilous conditions.
contentSnippet: Five years after millions of Rohingyas fled genocide in Myanmar, they continue to live in perilous conditions.

title: Turkey's Bayraktar TB2 drone: Why African states are buying them
content: Togo is the latest country to buy the drones, which have proven their usefulness around the world.
contentSnippet: Togo is the latest country to buy the drones, which have proven their usefulness around the world.

title: On call with Italy's horseback doctor
content: Dr Roberto Anfosso and Ambra make house calls around the village of La Morra in the Piedmont region.
contentSnippet: Dr Roberto Anfosso and Ambra make house calls around the village of La Morra in the Piedmont region.

title: Floods deluge parts of southern Pakistan
content: More than a dozen people are reported to have been killed including nine children.
contentSnippet: More than a dozen people are reported to have been killed including nine children.
